description.@en: You conjure a missile of energy that darts forth to harm your enemies (but not the darkness).

data.distance: Any one person you can see

criticalFailure.@en: The bolt flickers outwards before turning and striking you! You suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage and drop whatever is in your hands just outside of easy reach.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and the foe drops whatever is in their hands just outside of easy reach.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe suffers [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage.
